reviewText: Film is so dark, colors washed out, bad editing, etc.,  it's painful to watch. Releasing a movie on DVD in this shape should be illegal.
While the film quality is poor, the story of the leper colony Hawaii is makes the viewing worthwhile.
was a nice movie..ending leaves you wanting more..beautiful location..Bobby great as always
I never saw the movie before but always liked Bobby Sherman.  The movie was very interesting the scenery in the movie was beautiful and the story itself was amazing.

When I tried to watch the movie the message "Disc not able to play back" came up on the screen
what a waste of money!

I like the story but the video picture is too dark. I can hardly see the movie. It's very poor for what I payed for. I will probably never purchase anything from them again.
Pam Douglas
The quality of this DVD is incredibly poor. Looks like a direct transfer from a well worn 16mm print. Not much else to say. He Is My Brother
